24  package org.hibernate.cache.spi.access;
25  
26  import org.hibernate.cache.CacheException;
27  import org.hibernate.cache.spi.NaturalIdRegion;
28  
29  /**
30   * Contract for managing transactional and concurrent access to cached naturalId
31   * data.  The expected call sequences related to various operations are:<ul>
32   *     <li><b>INSERTS</b> : {@link #insert} -> {@link #afterInsert}</li>
33   *     <li><b>UPDATES</b> : {@link #lockItem} -> {@link #remove} -> {@link #update} -> {@link #afterUpdate}</li>
34   *     <li><b>DELETES</b> : {@link #lockItem} -> {@link #remove} -> {@link #unlockItem}</li>
35   *     <li><b>LOADS</b> : {@link @putFromLoad}</li>
36   * </ul>
37   * Note the special case of <b>UPDATES</b> above.  Because the cache key itself has changed here we need to remove the
38   * old entry as well as
39   * <p/>
40   * There is another usage pattern that is used to invalidate entries
41   * after performing "bulk" HQL/SQL operations:
42   * {@link #lockRegion} -> {@link #removeAll} -> {@link #unlockRegion}
43   * <p/>
44   * IMPORTANT : NaturalIds are not versioned so {@code null} will always be passed to the version parameter to:<ul>
45   *     <li>{@link #putFromLoad(Object, Object, long, Object)}</li>
46   *     <li>{@link #putFromLoad(Object, Object, long, Object, boolean)}</li>
47   *     <li>{@link #lockItem(Object, Object)}</li>
48   * </ul>
49   *
50   * @author Gavin King
51   * @author Steve Ebersole
52   * @author Eric Dalquist
53   */
54  public interface NaturalIdRegionAccessStrategy extends RegionAccessStrategy {
55  
56  	/**
57  	 * Get the wrapped naturalId cache region
58  	 *
59  	 * @return The underlying region
60  	 */
61  	public NaturalIdRegion getRegion();
62  
63  	/**
64  	 * Called after an item has been inserted (before the transaction completes),
65  	 * instead of calling evict().
66  	 * This method is used by "synchronous" concurrency strategies.
67  	 *
68  	 * @param key The item key
69  	 * @param value The item
70  	 * @return Were the contents of the cache actual changed by this operation?
71  	 * @throws CacheException Propogated from underlying {@link org.hibernate.cache.spi.Region}
72  	 */
73  	public boolean insert(Object key, Object value) throws CacheException;
74  
75  	/**
76  	 * Called after an item has been inserted (after the transaction completes),
77  	 * instead of calling release().
78  	 * This method is used by "asynchronous" concurrency strategies.
79  	 *
80  	 * @param key The item key
81  	 * @param value The item
82  	 * @return Were the contents of the cache actual changed by this operation?
83  	 * @throws CacheException Propogated from underlying {@link org.hibernate.cache.spi.Region}
84  	 */
85  	public boolean afterInsert(Object key, Object value) throws CacheException;
86  
87  	/**
88  	 * Called after an item has been updated (before the transaction completes),
89  	 * instead of calling evict(). This method is used by "synchronous" concurrency
90  	 * strategies.
91  	 *
92  	 * @param key The item key
93  	 * @param value The item
94  	 * @return Were the contents of the cache actual changed by this operation?
95  	 * @throws CacheException Propogated from underlying {@link org.hibernate.cache.spi.Region}
96  	 */
97  	public boolean update(Object key, Object value) throws CacheException;
98  
99  	/**
100 	 * Called after an item has been updated (after the transaction completes),
101 	 * instead of calling release().  This method is used by "asynchronous"
102 	 * concurrency strategies.
103 	 *
104 	 * @param key The item key
105 	 * @param value The item
106 	 * @param lock The lock previously obtained from {@link #lockItem}
107 	 * @return Were the contents of the cache actual changed by this operation?
108 	 * @throws CacheException Propogated from underlying {@link org.hibernate.cache.spi.Region}
109 	 */
110 	public boolean afterUpdate(Object key, Object value, SoftLock lock) throws CacheException;
111 }
